column4: q: normally my burned CDs show up with their track names if I stick in the CD on OSX or windows, but on Linux they show up as Track 1 or Track 2, any idea why?
probably you need to configure the applicated to download the tracks from the web
generally they use a service called 'freedb' or 'gracenote'
sorry, my first line meant 'download the track *names* from the web
